item.title: First BarCamp in Graz, Austria
item.description: This weekend the first BarCamp of Graz, Austria is going on. Location is the Karl-Franzens Universityand today it is going to start at 10.00 o’clock am. BarCamps are a growing type of events. A BarCamp is a so called unconference. On wikipedia you can read: BarCampsare organized and evangelized largely through the web, harnessing what might be called a Web 2.0communications toolkit. Anyone can initiate a BarCamp, using the BarCamp wiki.
